#include<cstdio>

#define gc getchar_unlocked
inline int read() {
	int ret=0;
	char c=gc();
	while(c<'0'||c>'9') c=gc();
	while(c>='0'&&c<='9') {
		ret=10*ret+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}
	return ret;
}


int main() {
	int T = read();
	while(T--){
		int N = read();
		int K = 0;
		int M = 1;
		while(M < N){
			K++;
			M=((K*(K+1))>>1) + 1;
		}
		printf("%d\n",K);
	}
	return 0;
}
